data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Jalor, Rajasthan, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jalor, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 20,116 believers in Jalor, Rajasthan, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Jalor, Rajasthan, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Jalor.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Makwana (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Jalor.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,828,700 people living in the county of Jalor.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,786,396 who are far from you in Jalor, Rajasthan, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Jalor
location.people_groups_list: Targala, Dabgar (Muslim traditions), Rajput Jadeja, Rajput Parmar, Salat (Muslim traditions)
